headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and featured dish names. Use italic variant for emphasis.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-[#B08D69] transition-all duration-300 rounded-none px-8 py-6 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest font-semibold
buttons.secondary: border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white transition-all duration-300 rounded-none px-8 py-6 text-sm uppercase tracking-widest
buttons.ghost: text-foreground hover:text-primary transition-colors italic font-serif text-lg

cards.menu_item: group relative overflow-hidden bg-white p-6 border border-border/50 hover:border-primary/30 transition-all duration-500

navigation.style: Floating glass header or solid refined bar

motion.scroll: Parallax on images, fade-up on text
motion.hover: Slow scale (1.05) on images, color shift on text

content_strategy.tone: Warm, poetic, inviting. Avoid 'tasty' or 'yummy'. Use 'exquisite', 'aromatic', 'crafted', 'heritage'.
sections: Hero: Immersive video/image with poetic headline.
About: 'A Symphony of Flavors' - Story of Indian heritage meeting global refinement.
Signature Highlights: 3-4 top dishes with 'Zoom in' effect.
Menu Preview: Categorized tabs (Indian, Continental, Oriental).

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'sonner' for all toast notifications (reservations success).
Create a 'components/ui/date-picker.jsx' wrapping Shadcn Calendar if needed.
Do NOT use standard Shadcn Card look. Remove borders, add generous padding, use subtle shadows.
Ensure the Reservation Form feels like a VIP concierge request, not a tax form.
IMPORTANT: Use the provided Unsplash/Pexels images as functional placeholders. Add comments in code: 'TODO: Replace with user-provided real restaurant images'.
Map the user's specific menu categories: Indian (North/Mughlai/Hyderabadi), Continental, Oriental/Asian, Biryani, Tandoor, Rolls, Fondue.
Implement a 'WhatsApp Reservation' button as a primary mobile action.
For the 'Fondue' section, use a specific elegant layout to highlight this unique offering.
universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark colors.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
